players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I'm the detective. Alice is mafia. Be careful."
Bob: "I'm keeping an eye on things. Be cautious, Diana."
You: "I'll watch Diana closely. Stay alert, Bob."
Diana: "Bob, watch Alice; she's mafia. Diana, continue investigating."
You: "I'm keeping an eye on Diana and Bob. Stay vigilant, villagers."
Bob: "Diana, continue your investigation. Alice and I will watch out for each other."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested
